paragraph: Note: Don't use the WIF from the example above, but use the one from the CLI-interface in Verus Desktop. ### The GUI wallet will not show any progress on the import and may give messages that the RPC daemon is not reacting. It will take quite some time for the process to finish in the background, especially if the address has many transaction on it. Information compiled by Oink.vrsc@. Note: revision date 2021-05-02.
